QuestData.Title: A Line in the Dirt
QuestData.Description: The Alliance scorches a trail of murder across the Barrens. We must stop them here or there is nothing left for us.$B$BAcross the Fields of Blood there are a number of strategic hills, marked by wooden towers and neutral gray banners. We must take and hold these hills if we hope to slow the Alliance advance!$B$BLook for the towers to the north, east, and south of what's left of Taurajo. Claim a neutral flag and defend the hill against counterattack!
QuestData.LogDescription: Capture a neutral hill in the Fields of Blood and defend it against an Alliance counterattack.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is the Alliance putting up a fight? How goes the battle for the Barrens?
QuestData.RewardText: So you held your ground! With tenacity like yours we may yet drive the Alliance from our lands.
